name: mr_wilson
text: A comment left by mr_wilson was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Mangtastic, wittyname, SotiCoto)

name: saint
text: knowin the intelligence of newscasters, they'd prob'ly play it out like someone shot the shit

name: skiddyfisk
text: I can but wonder if Beef mentioned shooting as a serious solution or a sarcastic "what in the hell do you think we are going to do with it ray", and then just went with it.

name: i_love_kate
text: You made this joke last time. That is terrible.

name: canusdivinus
text: The first time through was worth a 5. Reruns deserve lower scores :/

name: flavius
text: I was so relieved by this comic to know that I'm not the only one who shits their bed every once in a blue moon.

name: tekende
text: Come on, don't lie. You've been shitting your bed every night for the past seventy years.

name: jesler729
text: Every time I see one of these repeats I get confused. I can help it, there's just always a second where I'm all "wait WHAT"

name: honesttom
text: Now this strip has been rerun, I can give it a 10. Yes!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: I would have liked Beef doing a thoughtful cat 'sniff' wearing the beard in panel 4, as he is coming to the dreadful conclusion.

name: cagliostro
text: But surely it's funnier if he's just working it out from knowledge of Ray's previous form?

name: taskmaster
text: I agree. I think it's more hilarious that just because he knows Ray he can jump to the correct conclusion. I really want to know what his thought process is here.
